Key Match Events: England seal their second T20 World Cup triumph
Ben Stokes leads England to yet another World Cup
Post-Match Reflections: England is now the first team to hold both white-ball World Cups
Moeen Ali has called it the best day of his life
Miscellaneous Highlights: England is the first men's side to hold the 50-over and T20 World Cups at the same time
Others: Sam Curran was chosen as Player of the Tournament
Plaudits pour in for the white-ball kings
